channel.title: Pages on Beren's Bugs 'n Beasts

item.title: About Me
item.description: About I’ve been passionate about wildlife since I was a baby (I’m told). I’m always looking for new ways to learn about nature and animals. I have many rescued pets/animals, and most of them are reptiles. I live in beautiful Colorado, USA.
